A

AbstractMonsterController - Class in jpacman.controller
A controller which generates a monster move at regular intervals.
AbstractMonsterController(Engine) - Constructor for class jpacman.controller.AbstractMonsterController
Create a new monstercontroller using the default delay and the given game engine.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class jpacman.controller.AbstractMonsterController
ActionListener event caught when timer ticks.
Animator - Class in jpacman.controller
The primary responsibility of this class is to trigger the board viewer to display the next animation.
Animator(BoardViewer) - Constructor for class jpacman.controller.Animator
Create an animator for a particular board viewer.
apply() - Method in class jpacman.model.Move
Actually carry out the move. precondition: the move is possible.
apply() - Method in class jpacman.model.PlayerMove
Actually apply the move, assuming it is possible.

B

Board - Class in jpacman.model
Maintain a rectangular board of cells, potentially occupied by guests.

Create a new board given a width and a height.
boardHeight() - Method in class jpacman.model.Engine
Height of the board, offered for clients wishing to draw the board.
boardHeight() - Method in class jpacman.model.Game
Return the height of the Board used.
boardInvariant() - Method in class jpacman.model.Cell
A Cell should always be part of the Board given at construction.
BoardViewer - Class in jpacman.controller
A simple way to paint a pacman board.
BoardViewer(Engine) - Constructor for class jpacman.controller.BoardViewer
Create a new board viewer and attach it to the underlying pacman model.
boardWidth() - Method in class jpacman.model.Engine
Width of the board, offered for clients wishing to draw the board.
boardWidth() - Method in class jpacman.model.Game
Return the width of the Board used.

C

Cell - Class in jpacman.model
A Cell keeps track of its (x,y) position on the board, and the potential Guest occupying the Cell.
Cell(int, int, Board) - Constructor for class jpacman.model.Cell
Create a new cell at a given position on the board.
CELL_HGAP - Static variable in class jpacman.controller.BoardViewer
The horizontal gap between cells, in pixels.
CELL_VGAP - Static variable in class jpacman.controller.BoardViewer
The vertical gap between cells, in pixels.
cellAtOffset(int, int) - Method in class jpacman.model.Cell
Return the cell located at position (x + dx, y + dy), or null if this cell would fall beyond the borders of the Board.
cellHeight() - Method in class jpacman.controller.BoardViewer
The height of a cell (in pixels).
cellWidth() - Method in class jpacman.controller.BoardViewer
Width of cell.
consistent() - Method in class jpacman.model.Game
The game should always be in a consistent state, in particular, a player cannot win and die at the same time.
consistentBoardCellAssociation() - Method in class jpacman.model.Board
Check that each cell has a correct link to this board.
controllerInvariant() - Method in class jpacman.controller.AbstractMonsterController
Variable that should always be set.

eat(int) - Method in class jpacman.model.Player
Increase the amount of food eaten by an extra meal worth a certain amount of points.

The character code representing an empty cell.
Engine - Class in jpacman.model
The top level state machine, which also acts as interface to the viewer (which observes the state machine) and the controller (which triggers the state machine events).
Engine() - Constructor for class jpacman.model.Engine
Start a new engine with a default game using a default map.
Engine(Game) - Constructor for class jpacman.model.Engine
Start a new engine with a specific game.
exit() - Method in class jpacman.controller.Pacman
Terminate the game.

The character code representing the food guest type.

I

ImageFactory - Class in jpacman.controller
The responsibilities of this class include obtaining images from file, that can be used for animations of the player and the monsters in Pacman.

Read images for player and monsters from file.

Interface for a controller which generates a monster move at regular intervals.

invariant() - Method in class jpacman.controller.ImageFactory
Invariant that may be a bit expensive to compute all the time, so it is selectively invoked.
invariant() - Method in class jpacman.controller.Pacman
Instance variables that can't be null.
invariant() - Method in class jpacman.model.Board
A board's invariant is simply that both the width and the height are not negative.
invariant() - Method in class jpacman.model.Cell
Conjunction of all invariants.
invariant() - Method in class jpacman.model.Engine
We can be in at most one of the Engine's states.
invariant() - Method in class jpacman.model.Game
A game is either not yet initialized, or it is in a consistent state.
invariant() - Method in class jpacman.model.PlayerMove
Verify that the food eaten remains non negative, the player/mover equal and non-null.
inWonState() - Method in class jpacman.model.Engine
Yes, we have been lucky and we won!

Determine iff this cell is occupied.

J

jpacman.controller - package jpacman.controller
This package contains the controller as well as the viewers of the Pacman implementation.
jpacman.model - package jpacman.model
This package contains the pacman model: i.e., it contains representations for cells, monsters, the player, the board, the game, etc.
